translations: n．调解，和解：通过友好协商解决争端或分歧的过程。
· The two parties reached an agreement through conciliations.
通过调解，双方达成了协议。

sentences.sentence: The aim, he says, is "to reduce the enormous quantity of meetings, co-ordinations, permissions, conciliations, dispositions, regulations, circulars, etc, etc."
sentences.translation: 他讲道，这样做的目的是“减少数不尽的会议、部门间的协调、事务的许可、争端的协调、事故的处理、规章制度的订立以及通告的发布等。”
